def priority(item: float, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """Returns priority with which we want to add item to each bin using Harmonic strategy.

    Args:
        item: Size of item to be added to the bin.
        bins: Array of capacities for each bin.

    Return:
        Array of same size as bins with priority score of each bin.
    """
    harmonic_scores = 1 / (bins / item - 1)
    harmonic_scores[bins <= item] = np.inf
    priorities = -harmonic_scores
    return priorities
